txt.en: Saruman has reinforced the edge of Fangorn with some of his toughest forces. You and your fellows must stop the lumber-camp from destroying Fangorn and the Ents that protect it.
Save Fangorn by destroying Saruman's forces
Work your way up the side of the hill and to the edge of the Fangorn. Defeat all the enemy forces that stand in your way. Protect the Ents!
